channel.title: hugo-academic on Kevin Rue-Albrecht
channel.description: Recent content in hugo-academic on Kevin Rue-Albrecht

item.title: Getting started with Academic: the website builder for Hugo
item.description: Refer to the posts of the example site for the academic theme (written by the theme author): “Create a beautifully simple website in under 10 minutes”. “Learn how to blog in Academic using Jupyter notebooks” See also an example R Markdown document that compiles to a blog post if stored directly in content/post/.
